messages.subject: Re: Art supplies/Deb L
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/27/2001 12:43:01 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Oh Deb, Can  I ask how you do this. . . sounds like great fun!! Thanks lovemary Learning
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/27/2001 12:43:01 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
ddzimlew@... writes:


> We save credit card offers etc.
> and along with our own used paper make new paper in the blender about
> once a month. This paper has a beautiful texture and makes for
> interesting watercolor paintings. It's very sloppy to make and kids
> love it!
> Deb L
>

Oh Deb,

Can I ask how you do this. . . sounds like great fun!! Thanks

lovemary

"Learning is not a product of teaching â€¦ kids are born learning. They learn
how to walk, how to talk. They're basically little scientists. If we don't
stop that process, it will continue." - Grace Llewellyn
